subject: Football
Cruelty to Animals
organizations: Humane Society of the United States
People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals
lead_paragraph: Commissioner Roger Goodell is in the awkward position of having to consider whether to suspend Michael Vick, a player who has no track record of being in trouble, even if the indictment is damning.
snippet: Commissioner Roger Goodell is in the awkward position of having to consider whether to suspend Michael Vick, a player who has no track record of being in trouble, even if the indictment is damning.
